scripts.build:renderer: npx esbuild renderer/scripts/device/app.ts --bundle --outfile=renderer/scripts/device/app.js --platform=browser && npx esbuild renderer/scripts/home/app.ts --bundle --outfile=renderer/scripts/home/app.js --platform=browser
scripts.dev: npm run build:renderer && npm run build:css && npx tsc && npx electron .
scripts.dev:watch: npm run build:renderer && npm run build:css && npx concurrently "npx tsc -w" "npx electron ." "npm run watch:renderer-device" "npm run watch:renderer-home" "npm run watch:css"
